description: Face masks will be compulsory on public transport and in secondary schools when France lifts curbs.
title: Coronavirus: France mandates masks for schools and transport
title_page: Coronavirus: France mandates masks for schools and transport - BBC News
maintext: As the prime minister said, never in history - not in war, occupation or disease - has France had to confront such massive disruption. And now from the best fonctionnaire brains in the land comes an exit strategy that might just measure up to the disaster.
